Our extension provides a simple and direct search throw the Microsoft Bing!

In addition the extension provides an enhanced experience in page overview. It has a simple but very useful feature as highlighting a specific selected word in whole page! Such feature is very useful when you are looking for all recurrences of selected term, help you better navigate throw the page.

* Just double click on any word on the page and tell us what you think of that :)
